short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click on a player in ESPN FantasyCast to watch the game they are playing in.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app allows you to instantly watch your fantasy baseball players in action simply by clicking on them in ESPN's FantasyCast.
